Is An Error Register Property

Short Name: IsAnErrorReg

Requires:

Class: LeftShiftRegister Properties

To Use: Create a property.

Returns true if the shift register is an error register, else returns false. An error register is a special form of shift register that can only exist on a For Loop configured for parallel iterations and when the data type of the shift register is the error cluster.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
PermissionsRead Only
Available in Run-Time EngineNo
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemNo
Settable when the VI is runningNo
Loads the front panel into memoryNo
Need to authenticate before useNo
Loads the block diagram into memoryNo
Remote access allowedYes
